title: Can't login EUW (as usual)
body: as the title says, anyone else have this problem?

replies.body: Yea, there was a bit of an issue with the Server's yesterday but they fixed them not to long after the situation occurred. If you guys are ever wondering if your Region's Server is down, you can check here: https://www.google.com/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=league%20server%20status :D
Had the same problem last night. Even fiddled with my firewall settings, reset all my gear and kept getting no response from the server.
my client says that they have shut down for a while and working to get it back up :(
to me more precise they have shut down all the platform services
Well I was logged in when they brought ranked down then was booted off shortly after and unable to connect.  Weird.
mine keeps getting the no response from server, or is yours just an infinitely long queue?
i can't get a response from the server
same here, have been trying for like 40min
